com.cscguru.client.items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.items.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDrawable, ITipped, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Armor, Boots, Helm, OffHand, Weapon

    public abstract class Item
extends org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
implements IDrawable, ITipped
    Base class for all items.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
